statements: SELECT * FROM keyword_performance;
SELECT keyword, clicks, impressions FROM keyword_performance WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT keyword, ctr FROM keyword_performance WHERE conversion_rate > 10.00;
SELECT keyword, impressions FROM keyword_performance ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT keyword, clicks, conversion_rate FROM keyword_performance WHERE clicks < 50 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT keyword, clicks, impressions, conversion_rate FROM keyword_performance WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance WHERE impressions < 500 AND ctr >= 0.5;
SELECT keyword, impressions, conversion_rate FROM keyword_performance WHERE keyword LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY impressions ASC;
SELECT keyword, clicks FROM keyword_performance WHERE clicks BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY keyword ASC;
SELECT keyword, impressions, ctr FROM keyword_performance WHERE impressions > 1000 AND ctr < 0.3 ORDER BY keyword DESC, ctr ASC;
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance WHERE clicks > 100
SELECT keyword, impressions FROM keyword_performance WHERE cost < 50.0 ORDER BY impressions DESC
SELECT keyword, cost, average_position FROM keyword_performance ORDER BY keyword ASC
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM bidding_strategy WHERE target_roas IS NULL
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance WHERE average_position BETWEEN 1.0 AND 3.0 ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY impressions DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT keyword, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM keyword_performance GROUP BY keyword HAVING total_clicks > 500 ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT keyword_id, keyword, AVG(cost) AS avg_cost FROM keyword_performance WHERE impressions > 1000 GROUP BY keyword_id, keyword ORDER BY avg_cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance k JOIN bidding_strategy b ON k.clicks > b.max_cpc WHERE k.impressions > 500 ORDER BY k.clicks DESC, b.max_cpc ASC;

SELECT k.keyword, b.strategy_name, k.clicks, k.cost, b.max_cpc FROM keyword_performance k JOIN bidding_strategy b ON k.keyword_id = b.strategy_id WHERE k.clicks > 200 AND b.target_roas IS NOT NULL ORDER BY k.cost DESC, b.max_cpc DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance;
SELECT keyword, clicks, impressions FROM keyword_performance WHERE conversions > 0;
SELECT keyword, impressions, clicks FROM keyword_performance ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT keyword, clicks, conversions FROM keyword_performance ORDER BY impressions ASC;
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance WHERE clicks > 50 AND impressions < 100;
SELECT keyword, impressions, clicks FROM keyword_performance WHERE impressions > 100 ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT keyword, clicks, conversions FROM keyword_performance WHERE clicks > 50 AND conversions > 5 ORDER BY conversions DESC
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance WHERE impressions BETWEEN 50 AND 150 AND clicks BETWEEN 10 AND 50
SELECT keyword, impressions, conversions FROM keyword_performance WHERE keyword LIKE '%digital marketing%'
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance_data ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT keyword, clicks, conversions FROM keyword_performance_data WHERE impressions > 100 ORDER BY clicks ASC;
SELECT keyword, impressions FROM keyword_performance_data WHERE conversions >= 5 AND impressions < 500 ORDER BY keyword ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_data WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT ad_group_name, ad_group_budget FROM ad_group_data WHERE campaign_id = 3 ORDER BY ad_group_budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance_data WHERE impressions > 100 AND clicks < 50
SELECT keyword, impressions, conversions FROM keyword_performance_data WHERE keyword = 'SEO'
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_data ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT ad_group_name, ad_group_budget FROM ad_group_data WHERE campaign_id = 101
SELECT strategy_name, bid_amount, status FROM bid_strategy_data WHERE bid_amount > 50 ORDER BY bid_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance;
SELECT keyword_name, impressions, cost FROM keyword_performance WHERE clicks > 10;
SELECT keyword_name, conversions FROM keyword_performance ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT ad_name, headline, description FROM ad WHERE ad_group_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance ORDER BY keyword_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT keyword_name, impressions, cost FROM keyword_performance WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT ad_group_name, campaign_name FROM ad_group JOIN campaign ON ad_group.campaign_id = campaign.campaign_id WHERE campaign.active = TRUE ORDER BY campaign_name;
SELECT keyword_name, conversions, cost FROM keyword_performance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, action FROM user_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
